item.title: Using Intel I/OAT DMA
item.description: I/OAT (I/O Acceleration Technology) 1 Intel I/OAT is a set of technologies for improving I/O performance.

item.title: Using Ceph RBD as a QEMU Storage
item.description: This post explains how we can use a Ceph RBD as a QEMU storage.
